State.Author: Fallout 4 Experiences Team
State.Description: This experience will provide a complete horror-themed overhaul of Fallout 4.  It uses Whispering Hills and Fallout 4-76 Open World at its core with several accompanying mods to completely transform the game into a terrifying and unique survival-horror open exploration experience.
State.Name: Whispering Chills - The Ultimate Horror Overhaul Wabbajack Modlist

State.Author: 4estGimp and DankRafft
State.Description: This mod edits several enemy and combat behaviors for a more challenging experience  It is intended to be lightweight, and highly compatible while still making a noticeable difference.  A Complex Sorter NPC Scaling plugin in also available.
State.Name: AI Edit and Complex Sorter NPC Scaling

State.Author: zaslon07
State.Description: Ambient Tunnels of Boston is a mod that adds 30+ new dynamic and ambient sounds to the various Subway Stations and Tunnels of the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Ambient Tunnels of Boston

State.Author: Rcollpc
State.Description: Adds a skill system similar to previous games. Also makes some changes to the perk chart.
State.Name: Be Exceptional - Skills and Perk Overhaul

State.Author: zestoflemon
State.Description: A BF4 44 Magnum animation and sound set for the vanilla .44 Pistol
State.Name: BF4 44M

State.Author: Valyn81 and BenRierimanu
State.Description: Plugin Replacer for BostonFPSFix with PRP backports and bugfixes applied on top.
State.Name: Boston FPS Fix - PRP Edition

Original.Name: BtC - Subways of the Commonwealth Music Addition-71365-1-0-1685390745.zip

State.Author: ScreamingLake and Mortercotic
State.Description: Beyond the Commonwealth is a community-wide initiative to bring music created by members of the Fallout 4 community into quest and new location mods that currently do not have any.
State.Name: Beyond the Commonwealth - A Music Expansion Project

State.Author: Thumblesteen and me
State.Description: Increases the volume of the impact sound of bullets on all surfaces, their soundcracks and tails, the result is a crunchy, dangerous soundscape that will make you duck in cover in every gunfight
State.Name: Bullet Impact Overhaul

State.Author: Elianora
State.Description: Small, amazing looking player home with the settlement system. All workbenches, tons of custom storage and clutter, mirror to change your appearance, etc.
State.Name: Chestnut Lodge - Player Home

State.Author: SuperNath97
State.Description:
After receiving a lead to a condemned apartment complex on the outskirt of West Roxbury, you are compelled to visit it.



Claustrophobia is a fan homage to the cancelled silent hills game, it was inspired by its predecessor silent hill 2 and resident evil 1.
State.Name: Claustrophobia

State.Author: Omeag4D2
State.Description: This mod changes Caps to either USD, EUR, or RUB by replacing not only the model but the User interface icons as well.
State.Name: Commonwealth Currency Overhaul

State.Author: WasteTheLand
State.Description: This mod replaces existing Fusion Generators in the world with used/depelted equivalents. None of these generators have a fusion core attached. Light fixtures were also removed around the generators.
State.Name: Depleted Fusion Generators

State.Author: Elianora
State.Description: Mod ads 50 new lore-friendly armours, 20 accessories, tons of moddable colours. Institute, Settler, Wastelander, Raider, Vault suit. Both sexes. Vanilla and CBBE body, with BodySlide compatibility.
State.Name: Eli's Armour Compendium

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: Extensive, modular and highly compatible equipment overhaul and expansion of the crafting system. Configure the mod to your liking via holotape or MCM.
State.Name: Equipment and Crafting Overhaul (ECO) - Deprecated

Original.Name: FallEvil - Zombie Mega Pack Main File-59293-1-2-1663969670.rar

State.Author: CAPCOM - Arroganz
State.Description: Final released one of my biggest projects to date. Includes zombies from RE 2 Remake, Umbrella Chronicles, Racoon City, and the original RE 1 Remake. This is no April Fools joke...
State.Name: FallEvil - Zombie Mega Pack

State.Author: The Capital Wasteland Team
State.Description: Fallout 4: Point Lookout is a fan recreation of Fallout 3's Point Lookout DLC, fully realized in Fallout 4, including all quests and NPCs.
State.Name: Fallout 4 - Point Lookout

State.Author: UFR
State.Description: Adjust all the window reflections to your liking! Includes 4K textures and real-time reflections!
State.Name: Ultimate Window Overhaul Redone

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: THE NIGHTS ARE DARK AND FULL OF FERALS. If the player is not safe at a defended workshop during the night, large packs of feral ghoul hunters will chase the player from dusk 'till dawn.
State.Name: Feral Nights by SKK

State.Author: Cooler Balin and FO Miami
State.Description: A standalone Fire Axe melee weapon, that can also start fires.
State.Name: Fire Axe - A Standalone Melee Weapon

State.Author: reg2k
State.Description: Adds a photo mode to Fallout 4, accessible from the Pause menu or via hotkey.
State.Name: FO4 Photo Mode

State.Author: vOblivi0n
State.Description: Halloween 2 (Dick Warlock) mask created by me.
State.Name: Halloween 2 - Michael Myers Mask

State.Author: Subleader
State.Description: This mod adds the Uzi smg to Fallout 4 with a lot of customization and leveled list.
State.Name: IMI Uzi - Smg

State.Author: AnotherOne aka RetroPaladin - Octodecoy
State.Description: Not a little patch or addon, but full set of immersive ingestible animations.
State.Name: Immersive Animation Framework

State.Author: Zana Daniel
State.Description:
A Fallout experience that feels realistic, rewarding, and ultimately much more fun. 

Step out of the vanilla fantasy and step into some reality.
State.Name: Immersive Fallout

State.Author: Xcytress
State.Description: More Scrap! Better Scrap! Overhaul of a lot of junk and scrap to contain the proper components and proper amount.
State.Name: Immersive Scrapping

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: Adds more unmarked interior locations to the game.
State.Name: Inside Jobs - Commonwealth Interiors Add-On

State.Author: Mortercotic
State.Description: My attempt to improve the audio from Fallout 4. Collection of sound tweaks, fixes and other packs!
State.Name: LOST Audio Tweaks (LAT)

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: This mod fixes bugs and inconsistencies within Leveled Item forms, standardises and extends some instances, and controls DLC item distribution. Comes with a configuration holotape and optional MCM.
State.Name: Leveled Item Fixes (LIF)

State.Author: Mortercotic
State.Description: My attempt to improve the audio from Fallout 4. Collection of sound tweaks, fixes and other packs!
State.Name: LOST Audio Tweaks (LAT)

State.Author: EvTital - i_code_i
State.Description: Adds a new heavy weapon, the M2 flamethrower with custom animations and leveled list integration.
State.Name: M2 Flamethrower Redux

Original.Name: Modern Weapon Replacers - All In One Pack - FOMOD Installer-33523-FOMOD14-1-1659134262.7z

State.Author: cyanide4suicide
State.Description: Combines several weapon replacers into a single installer. Replaces most vanilla ballistic weapons. Highly modular installer for freedom of choice
State.Name: Modern Weapon Replacers - All-In-One Pack

State.Author: gumgum339339
State.Description:
Adds a bunch of mutilated corpses to all Raider and Supermutant locations.

Plus a new quest and a weapon.
State.Name: Mutilated Dead Bodies

State.Author: Raff1969
State.Description: This is a starter kit for just as you exit the vault as we are told in the intro our hero was a soldier. When he left the Army he buried his old kit in his back garden,with a grand of his own money little did he know it would be worthless.
State.Name: Nate's Old Footlocker

State.Author: twizz0r
State.Description: A simple texture replacement to remove the persistent fake puddles from the game. No more fake reflections!
State.Name: No More Fake Puddles

State.Author: AKcelsior
State.Description: Turns your omnidirectional Pip-Boy light into a projectile beam!
State.Name: Pip-Boy Flashlight (Pipboy - Power Armor - Lamp Overhaul)

State.Author: Ceaseless and PDE
State.Description: After a thousand endorsements, thanks to you all, I've decided to rework Red Rocket based on my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/10089]Starlight Drive-In And Diner[/url] enhancement.
State.Name: Red Rockets' Glare REDONE - Lighting

State.Author: JD Dornan Workshop
State.Description:
Hello Wastelanders ! J.D here, and today, i humbly present you your new safe places : The saferoom !



It's 11 saferooms and 1 settlement based on some iconic place of the resident evil saga and a reproduction of RE2 PS1 Racoon City !
State.Name: Resident Evil Saferoom

State.Author: henkspamadres
State.Description: Adds see-through (so no scope overlay) Combat Scopes to various weapons.
State.Name: See Through Scopes

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: FastStart a new game in less than 2 minutes from Main menu > Looks menu > SPECIAL menu > Outside Vault 111 with most mod added inventory items. This is a scripted bypass, not a static savegame so you get full player customisation and fresh RNG.
State.Name: SKK Fast Start new game

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: Fallout 4-76 transforms the Commonwealth into an open world with all areas unlocked and no human NPCs for a quest free land of scavenging opportunity. Repopulate with whatever actors you need to create your own narrative for another survive, scavenge and rebuild experience.
State.Name: Fallout 4-76 Open World

Original.Name: South of the Sea - Atoms Storm-63152-1-9-1695418209.7z

State.Author: Baerthe Cryptdick Carnagefiend Wanaming0 HaplessAccreditation
State.Description: Enhancing the Glowing Sea and Quincy Marshes, with new enemies, locations, and rewards.
State.Name: South of the Sea - Atoms Storm

State.Author: FX0x01 - F34R - Navaro - luchadordev
State.Description: Adds a highly customizable M1A Rifle that features a quest, custom sounds, animations in 1st and 3rd person and leveled list integration.
State.Name: Springfield Armory M1A

State.Author: Urania
State.Description: Stealth system fixed !! It's now  possible to take out enemies one by one ( even undetected, if done carefully ). No more magic enemies "almost seeing through walls",  and alerting everyone around "telepathically"  for no reason
State.Name: STEALTH  AND  DETECTION  SYSTEM

State.Author: vividevavid
State.Description:
Add an In-game Map item for Ghostfc3s's Subway Runner.

Support MCM hotkey.
State.Name: Subway Runner Map (Unofficial)

State.Author: Aarwyn
State.Description: A collection of outfits themed at being casual, but still showing signs of wear and injury, as one would have in the Wastes.
State.Name: Survival Outfit Collection - CBBE Bodyslide - Vanilla

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Take a stroll at a distant cemetery, enjoy the silence and the hellhounds. You can also set up camp there.
State.Name: The Cemetery - Plainfield Cemetery

Original.Name: The Goodneighbor Condo Player Home v1.5-21873-1-5-1562241461.zip

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: A large, multi-level player home inspired by old-school player home mods from Fallout 3 and Fallout: New Vegas. It provides a comfortable, pre-decorated, move-in ready home with all the amenities and many scripted interactive features.
State.Name: The Goodneighbor Condo Player Home

State.Author: Zherros
State.Description: Adds a new dungeon inhabited by a mannequin-obsessed cult.
State.Name: The Mannequin Cult

State.Author: Corvalho
State.Description: This mod adds a standalone modular sawn off double-barrelled adjective-rich shotgun into your game.
State.Name: The Widow Shotgun

State.Author: L00
State.Description: A gore and blood overhaul for Fallout 4.
State.Name: True Blood

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: This small mod fixes the exaggerated shine of specific objects while it's raining.
State.Name: Wetness Shader Fix

State.Author: Mangaclub
State.Description: This mod turns Fallout 4 into a Silent Hill like Nigthtmare. From now on you will be surrounded by Thick Fog, strange sounds and occasionally being dragged into a otherworld where monsters (SirenHead, Mumblers, Lyingfigures, Ghouls, Silent hill Nurses, Twin head Screamers and Dogs) await you and Pyramidhead awaits you in his own Hell Level.
State.Name: Whispering Hills - a Silent Hill Horror overhaul for Fallout 4

Original.Name: WoodCrate 2k - It has been a long time-69611-0-1-1678650225.7z

State.Author: HappoMatka
State.Description: A once over for a container.
State.Name: WoodCrate - It has been a long time

State.Author: scoobiesdoobies
State.Description: Winchester Model 1897 replacer for the combat shotgun.
State.Name: WWII Weapon Replacers - Winchester Model 1897

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: FO4Edit is the Fallout 4 version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: FO4Edit

State.Author: Jambo11
State.Description: Realistic weapon scrapping
State.Name: Better Weapon Scrap

State.Author: eclix and GELUXRUM
State.Description: Adds new weapon mechanics: extra bullet on partial reload, immersive ammo checking, fire mode switch, ammo drop on reload and more.
State.Name: Bullet in the Chamber - Expanded Weapon Mechanics

State.Author: EvTital
State.Description: Adds a new type of enemy, defective synths.
State.Name: Defective Synths

State.Author: Brooklyn Taylor
State.Description: This is long awaited merge of FallEvil from Arroganz. This combines all FallEvil ediitons into one simple package.
State.Name: FallEvil - Complete Edition

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A highly configurable HUD. Every widget can be positioned and configured. Configure your design in the in-game layout manager in MCM. Layouts can be shared and imported too.
State.Name: FallUI - HUD

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Fatigue - ECR removes the the static aim behavior when using guns. Your character stats influence your gun handling and will improve it, the more you invest in it. The weight of your gun, now slowly drains your Action Points, while aiming and handling the recoil. The lower your Action Points fall, the wobble of your weapon will increase.
State.Name: Fatigue - Enhanced Combat Realism

Original.Name: Ithaca Model 37 Pump Shotgun - Main File-36908-1-2-1555956891.7z

State.Author: DOOM
State.Description: Adds the Ithaca Model 37 Pump Shotgun to the game with custom Models, Textures, Sounds and Animations! Requires Far Harbor DLC.
State.Name: Ithaca Model 37 - Pump Shotgun

State.Author: Neanka
State.Description: new LevelUpMenu which also allow to add brand new perks into game, remove any classic perks and even add skills system into game
State.Name: LevelUpMenuEx

State.Author: ajuszkiewicz
State.Description:
This mod adds eight new throwing flares, twelve new fireworks flares, eleven new rocket flares (including three weather changing), seven new flare mines and new flare gun with exchangeable chambers for multiple kinds of flare munitions. 

It is very handy when Darker Nights mod is active.
State.Name: Multi color flares

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a series of tweaks for the Whispering Chills total overhaul.
State.Name: Sweet Whispers - A Whispering Chills Addon and Tweak Package

State.Author: AKcelsior
State.Description:
Adds wearable flashlight gear to the wasteland.



+ 8 Unique models

+ 10 Distance settings

+ Craftable bulbs

+ Dynamic shadows

+ Volumetric light

+ Automatic leveled list integration
State.Name: Tactical Flashlights

Original.Name: The Red Wave V2 (Far Harbor Update) v2.1.2-41874-2-1-2-1611418830.rar

State.Author: ScottyDoesKnow
State.Description: Player-owned fast travel boat with 12 Commonwealth and 4 Far Harbor locations. Requires Far Harbor.
State.Name: The Red Wave V2 (Far Harbor Update) - Personal Traveling Boat

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: A healthy mix of erosion, molerats and exploding bugs have made an interconnected underground accessible to the average wastelander. Travel from the Glowing Sea to the eastern coast without seeing the sun.
State.Name: The Tunnels - For Cave People and Molerats

State.Author: The Unofficial Patch Project Team
State.Description: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4. The goal of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (aka UFO4P) is to eventually fix every bug with Fallout 4 not officially resolved by the developers to the limits of the Creation Kit and community-developed tools, in one easy-to-install package.
State.Name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch - UFO4P

State.Author: Nvidia
State.Description: New questline, 4 new areas to explore, displays new way of handling volumetric lighting.
State.Name: Vault 1080

State.Author: pra
State.Description: A compilation of my autopatch/utility scripts.
State.Name: Pra's Fo4Edit Scripts - Automatic Patch Generation

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which makes console menu show extra useful infomation about selected target,for example, target's name, ID, baseID, mod name and so on.This plugin also add some extra info lists to console to show selected actor's all kinds of info like factions, perks, active effects, actor values, equipments and so on.
State.Name: Better Console - F4SE

State.Author: ScreamingLake and Mortercotic
State.Description: Beyond the Commonwealth is a community-wide initiative to bring music created by members of the Fallout 4 community into quest and new location mods that currently do not have any.
State.Name: Beyond the Commonwealth - A Music Expansion Project

Original.Name: BtC - Stumble Upon Interiors Music Addition-71365-1-0-1685390892.zip

State.Author: ScreamingLake and Mortercotic
State.Description: Beyond the Commonwealth is a community-wide initiative to bring music created by members of the Fallout 4 community into quest and new location mods that currently do not have any.
State.Name: Beyond the Commonwealth - A Music Expansion Project

State.Author: ScreamingLake and Mortercotic
State.Description: Beyond the Commonwealth is a community-wide initiative to bring music created by members of the Fallout 4 community into quest and new location mods that currently do not have any.
State.Name: Beyond the Commonwealth - A Music Expansion Project

State.Author: ap05
State.Description:
Burst Impact Blast FX MOD changes the fallout4 particle effect.

Fallout 4 Effect is not cool. So I change it coolly like the latest FPS game.

All the resources I modified are those included in Fallout 4.
State.Name: Burst Impact Blast FX

State.Author: D1v1ne122 - RokMod - DanielVictory
State.Description: Children of Ug-Qualtoth is a lore-friendly suspenseful lovecraftian quest mod with a sprawling dungeon, unique enemies, custom composed music and new weapons. Follow the trail of the Dunwich company and discover a disturbing past long forgotten.
State.Name: Children of Ug-Qualtoth

State.Author: Omeag4D2
State.Description: This mod changes Caps to either USD, EUR, or RUB by replacing not only the model but the User interface icons as well.
State.Name: Commonwealth Currency Overhaul

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which keeps game going in real-time while menus are open. This plugin is highly customizable,  you can toggle on/off every menu's unpause behavior via MCM.
State.Name: Fallsouls - Unpaused Game Menus

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Better workbench interface optimized for PC. Bigger display size. Data columns. Comparision columns for mods. Item icon tag support. Icon menu for choosing your icon tag. Item subtitles. Autobuilding modules with zero cost. All languages included.
State.Name: FallUI - Workbench

State.Author: ramccoid
State.Description: This retextures the sun to give a radiant effect.
State.Name: FO4 SUN

Original.Name: Glowing Animals Emit Light - ALL DLC-9239-1-1.zip

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: Simply makes glowing animal variants emit light, scaled to their size.
State.Name: Glowing Animals Emit Light

State.Author: Racerx240sx
State.Description: This adds a face mask to the game with different craft-able textures.
State.Name: Half Face Mask

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Reduces MCM loading time to nearly instant loading
State.Name: MCM Booster

State.Author: reg2k - Neanka - shadowslasher410
State.Description: The Mod Configuration Menu is a settings page for mods! It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.
State.Name: Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: sdak
State.Description: Modern Pharmacy - replaces most of the commonwealth chems with their modern counterparts.
State.Name: Modern Pharmacy

State.Author: MisterOverseer aka Oakland Elliff
State.Description: With the Rad Spiders mod, you can now come across everyone's favourite radioactive arachnids, the Rad Spider. Several newly added dungeons feature these brand new creepy crawlies.
State.Name: Rad Spiders - Giant Spiders of the Commonwealth

State.Author: carxt
State.Description: Whipped this out in like an hour or something.
State.Name: Silent Protagonist F4SE

State.Author: gargorias
State.Description: This is a comprehensive lighting mod that brings you many more shadow lights and a general improvement to overall lighting, ambience and fog to the interiors of the Commonweatlh, Far Harbor and Nuka World.
State.Name: Ultra Interior Lighting

State.Author: kinggath
State.Description:
Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.



For Players: New controls and faster, more stable workshop scripts.



For Modders: Add new resource types, override settings, and generally change the way settlements work dynamically.
State.Name: Workshop Framework

State.Author: DoubleYou
State.Description: Bethesda's INI configuration files are a mess. BethINI optimizes the game for increased graphical fidelity and performance.
State.Name: BethINI

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: Extensive, modular and highly compatible equipment overhaul and expansion of the crafting system. Configure the mod to your liking via holotape or MCM.
State.Name: Equipment and Crafting Overhaul (ECO) - Deprecated

State.Author: Exodus
State.Description: Retextures the .44 Magnum with new albedo, specular, and gloss maps. All textures are made from scratch. Available in double resolution (max 4096 x 4096 px) or standard resolution (max 2048 x 2048 px).
State.Name: .44 Magnum Retexture

Original.Name: 4estGimp - Subways of the Commonwealth Precombine Fix-67619--92-1673319216.7z

State.Description: Deletes edits which break precombines.  Rebuilds the station at Goodneighbor.
State.Name: 4estGimp - Subways of the Commonwealth Precombines Fix

State.Author: Ghostfc3s
State.Description: This mod changes the ammo boxes into ammo mags
State.Name: Ammo boxes to mags

State.Author: 54yeg and elzee
State.Description: Additional car alarm sounds for Elzee's Car Alarms mod which fixes some overly ear-piercing audios by replacing them with other, more preferable ones, or adding additional sounds if you prefer
State.Name: Car Alarms - Extras and Enhanced

State.Author: iqoniq
State.Description: Find your darkest, quietest settlement, snuggle into your sleeping bag, turn off the light and turn on your radio because 77 tales of horror are ready to give you nightmares,  This also includes the Dunwich Horror by HP Lovecraft that is the inspiration for Dunwich Borers as a holotape.  Available as ESP or ESL.
State.Name: Commonwealth Horror Radio

State.Author: Dangermouse330
State.Description: Replaces the generic paintings in the game with creepy, horror'esq ones
State.Name: Creepy Paintings

Original.Name: Fallout 4-76 Open World - MCM Settings Menu-66422-040-1669394360.rar

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Full featured MCM Settings Menu for Fallout 4-76 by SKK50. Setup your Open World settings with the comfort of the MCM menu.
State.Name: Fallout 4-76 Open World - MCM Settings Menu

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: A whole new icon library with many fancy icons for usage in the FallUI mods. Including many customization settings.

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: This is FallUI - Inventory. A optimized Fallout 4 inventory interface for PC.

State.Description: Full featured MCM settings menu for Feral Nights by SKK

State.Description: Complete Modlist and Load Order Guide for Best Fallout 4 Modding Experience. Extreme Fallout 4 Engine & Textures Mods Optimization.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Mod List and Load Order Guide (BiRaitBec Modlist)

State.Author: Soroka90
State.Description: More lighting for the playing field!
State.Name: More Oil Lamps ENG

State.Author: ExpoAlt
State.Description: Adds the MTs-255 Revolver Shotgun to the Commonwealth. Favoured by the Gunners, this Russian-made hunting shotgun features several variants to adapt to your preferred play style.
State.Name: MTs-255 Revolver Shotgun

State.Author: TrickyVein
State.Description: Adds lots of Chainsaws to the game.
State.Name: Murdering Chainsaw

State.Author: PrecisionTacos
State.Description: Adds 16 unique raiders, 22 unique clothes, and a new small faction of raiders into the Commonwealth, (now ESLified)!
State.Name: Nightmare Raiders

State.Author: ghostrecon123
State.Description: Re-textures the default ammo boxes to resemble the ammo boxes from the Resident Evil franchise.
State.Name: Resident Evil Ammo Boxes Re-texture

State.Author: BlancForest
State.Description: Replaces SFXs for Silent Hill 3 Fans. Small changes big impacts. Works well standalone, or with the Whispering Hills Mod by Mangaclub.
State.Name: Silent Hill 3 Inspired Sound Replacements for use alone or with Whispering Hills

Original.Name: SKK Random Encounter Manager - MCM Settings Menu-56580-1-12-1666395404.rar

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Full featured MCM settings menu for SKK Random Encounter Manager
State.Name: SKK Random Encounter Manager - MCM Settings Menu

Original.Name: Stevens M-520 Shotgun Plus Update AIO-35943-1-9-1-1587228365.7z

State.Author: jsnider193 - BlutKult - Ragnarr1313
State.Description: Conversion of the Stevens M-520 shotgun resource posted here on the Nexus by Blutkult.  Includes 4 versions of the weapon (standard, camo, desert and the reaper looks) with multiple mods available to enhance the weapon. (Latest upload is fix for missing material file).  ESL work done by Ragnarr1313
State.Name: Stevens M-520 Shotgun

Original.Name: Subways of the Commonwealth (SotC) - Standalone v.0.99g-21527-0-99g.rar

State.Author: Recluse
State.Description: Adds 7 functional, populated, and connected Subway Stations to the Commonwealth, located near Concord, Cambridge, Diamond City, Goodneighbor, The Castle, Malden Center, and Jamaica Plain. Immersive fast travel, rentable beds, cloud storage, shipping containers, crafting stations, guards, NPCs, Doctors, and Vendors. Ideal for survival mode.
State.Name: Subways of the Commonwealth (SotC) - Standalone

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Automatically add item sorting tags to all items for all common item sorters. Highly versatile and completely configurable: custom processing rules, custom tag sets, custom naming rules. You can just change anything to your liking. Standard rules support most custom mods out-of-the-box.

State.Description: Collection of conversions from Skyrim's KS Hairdos and ApachiiSkyHair.

State.Description: Complete overhaul of gunshot sounds that covers all ranged weapons of Fallout 4 (player+NPC)

State.Description: Full HQ Rework of Feral Ghouls Sounds for a more Vicious Encounters

State.Author: Azebal
State.Description: Replaces the commonwealth's dull/repetitive atmospheric sounds with that of Hunts.

State.Author: ghostrecon123 and fadingsignal
State.Description: Adds a weapon inspired by Resident Evil's Samurai Edge using fadingsignal's M9 mod as a base.
State.Name: Resident Evil Samurai Edge M9

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
RobCo Patcher, is a patcher based on F4SE and CommonLibF4, which allows mod authors and users to modify game data without the use of plugins.

You can modify ammos, npcs, races, weapons and more.
State.Name: RobCo Patcher

Original.Name: The Eyes of Beauty Fallout Kaleidoscope Edition - All-in-One-133-3-2.7z

State.Author: LogRaam aka Gabriel Mailhot
State.Description: Change eyes textures for new high resolution ones.  Will work for both gender.  New textures will be added so keep in touch!
State.Name: The Eyes Of Beauty Fallout Edition

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Fallout 4 melee combat will change forever. Blocking Overhaul revamps the Fallout 4s blocking system on the engine level.
State.Name: Blocking Overhaul

State.Author: bluechipmunk1225
State.Description: Complete redesign of Fallout 4's explosion sounds
State.Name: Commonwealth Explosion Overhaul

State.Author: bluechipmunk1225
State.Description: Complete redesign of Fallout 4's explosion sounds
State.Name: Commonwealth Explosion Overhaul

State.Author: Giggilyomeromicon
State.Description: Adds approximately 170 spawnpoints with passive wildlife.
State.Name: Commonwealth Critters

State.Author: Macabre Productions
State.Description: The File-of-the-Month winning mod from Fallout 3 reaches the Commonwealth!  A full stand-alone radio station featuring hours of original music & hours of DJ talk and banter with a fully written 'fleshed-out' robot DJ!
State.Name: Existence 2.0

State.Author: elr0y7
State.Description: Streamlined intro tweaks: removes intro video, makes fade in dark, removes sink/mirror sounds and visuals, etc.  Great for FROST users, widescreen users, and others.
State.Name: Intro Tweaks

State.Author: AGodComplexPikachu CurioNC EmissaryOFWind JTesmer ANiceOakTree Kirse10 imAarwyn Robberfox RoboAsimov TrophiHunter Wendera
State.Description: A mod that adds hundreds of new options to customize your character such as face paint, tattoos, scars, makeup, brows, haircolors, etc~!
State.Name: Looks Menu Customization Compendium

State.Author: Satafinix
State.Description: HQ Total rework for Deathclaw sounds including new vicious sounds SFX
State.Name: Monsterum -DeathClaw Sounds Rework-

State.Author: zorak912
State.Description: This mod adds new creepy and not-so-creepy sounds to the commonwealth atmosphere
State.Name: Sinister Ambient Sound

State.Author: epsadin
State.Description: This is an extended version of the amazing Barefoot Footstep mod. It adds barefoot sounds to metal, carpet and vault floor materials, as well as modifies stone / concrete and sand ones. This mod also adds barefoot sneaking sounds to all of the above. Credit goes to the user GrozaTerroristow, who is the author of the famous original mod.
State.Name: Barefoot Footstep Extended

State.Author: Slackroyd
State.Description: Patching A Forest for improved tree placement and compatibility
State.Name: A Forest Tree Trim

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Urban car alarms.  Can be useful.
State.Name: Car Alarm

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Squeaks, buzzes, rumbles... Adds over 40 hand placed sounds to Diamond City
State.Name: Diamond City Ambience

State.Author: The Capital Wasteland Team
State.Description: Fallout 4: Point Lookout is a fan recreation of Fallout 3's Point Lookout DLC, fully realized in Fallout 4, including all quests and NPCs.
State.Name: Fallout 4 - Point Lookout

State.Author: Ethganz - Ethnet and Arroganz-
State.Description: Starting the new year off strong. Adds a terrifying plethora of new archetypes to the Feral Ghoul faction that makes them much more challenging but funner to fight.
State.Name: FGEP - Feral Ghouls Expansion Pack

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: GCM allows you easily set many game settings without the need of additional ESPs or console commands.
State.Name: Game Configuration Menu

State.Author: L00
State.Description: GRIM is a  modular and comprehensive horror-based overhaul for Fallout4.
State.Name: GRIM - The Curse

State.Author: Spifferino
State.Description: A simple mod that aims to retexture the subway stations and make them look gritty and dirty.
State.Name: Gritty Subway Stations (2K - 4K)

State.Author: WasteTheLand
State.Description: Replaces Robots, Protectron Pods, Terminals other linked objects with replaced, salvaged, destroyed, removed/disabled objects to create a more desolate environment.
State.Name: Looted Robots

State.Author: MassShep
State.Description: Misty Pines Overhaul
State.Name: Misty Pines Overhaul

State.Author: Poet
State.Description: Collection of patched plugins for several popular mods to prevent stuttering, crashing and other problems, all packed into a single modular FOMOD installer.
State.Name: Optimization Patches Collection

State.Author: BetaVirus
State.Description: DISCONTINUED - This mod improves performance (FPS) in Boston and surrounding area. External areas only. This mod is beneficial to anyone that roams the Boston area with mods that disable previs or break precombines in the Boston area.
State.Name: Boston FPS Fix - aka BostonDT PreVis-PreCombine

State.Author: Dylbill
State.Description: Some changes I made to registrator2000's Quicktrade mod, which adds an option to quickly trade with merchants and settlers.
State.Name: QuickTrade Redux

State.Author: IceKK
State.Description: Disabled Mouse Acceleration, Horizontal/Vertical Parity, Scalable ADS Multiplier, Normalized Sensitivity
State.Name: RAW INPUT - The Ultimate Mouse Sensitivity Fix

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: The Boxcar Cottage is a small, no-frills way station player that serves as a resting place while on your way to somewhere else. It is located north of Tenpines Bluff and west of Outpost Zimonja. The Boxcar provides a place of refuge from radstorms allowing you to catch up on your sleep, drop off some loot, or do some crafting.
State.Name: The Boxcar Cottage Player Home

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Lift the curse of Blair Residence. And don't get killed by the ghost.
State.Name: The Curse of Blair Residence - A Tiny Horror House

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Step down into the sewers and see where the journey takes you
State.Name: The Sewers

State.Author: Zen
State.Description: Dark, stoney cave retextures in 2k and 4k. Complex Parallax support (ENB v0.487 required)
State.Name: Very Zen Dark Caves

State.Author: StamperDoesMods
State.Description: Terror awaits as the nightmarish wendigo invades the Commonwealth with this simple, lightweight mod for Fallout 4! Each installation of Wasteland Bestiary endeavors to introduce a new, lore-friendly creature without all the extra fluff. Because for some of us, simplicity works best.
State.Name: Wasteland Bestiary - Wendigos

State.Author: Peregrin0
State.Description: Compatibility patch for Everyone's Best Friend (EBF) and version 2.1.0 of the Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch (UFO4P). Both modify the same Papyrus script files causing one to override the corrections of the other. This mod merges the script changes.
State.Name: EBF UFO4P compatibility fix

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: GCM allows you easily set many game settings without the need of additional ESPs or console commands.
State.Name: Game Configuration Menu

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description:
Find your way through a weird dimension.

Based on the work of Kane Pixels and Async
State.Name: The Backrooms - The Poolrooms - A Liminal ASYNC Experience .

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Simple F4SE plugin (dll) to delay XP popups till after combat.
State.Name: Combined Combat XP (F4SE)

State.Author: MoreLikeVicky
State.Description: Adds a new Outfit to the game inspired by Resident Evil 4 Leon's Outfit.
State.Name: RE4 - Leon's Outfit (EVB - Vanilla)

State.Author: AntoniX
State.Description:
Fixed twitching/stuttering when sprinting in first person.



Исправление дрожания камеры от первого лица при спринте.
State.Name: Sprint Stuttering Fix

State.Author: Kassent
State.Description: This is a F4SE plugin which restores some hard-coded features disabled by game in survival mode,for example,unlock console,enable TGM,enable fast travel,restore vanilla compass settings,enalbe quick save and auto save,etc .
State.Name: Unlimited Survival Mode - F4SE

State.Author: m8r98a4f2
State.Description: Save, load, transfer, import and export all your MCM settings at once. Transfer settings between savegames, backup your favorite settings, or send your settings to another user!
State.Name: MCM Settings Manager

State.Author: Karandra
State.Description: This mod allows preload F4SE plugins before the game initializes.
State.Name: xSE PluginPreloader F4

State.Author: Spifferino
State.Description: Ambient Wasteland is back! Immerse yourself in the wastes with sounds of wildlife and more! Ported over from Fallout 3, Ambient wasteland offers many new ambient sound effects added seamlessly into the base game.
State.Name: Ambient Wasteland - Fallout 4 Edition

State.Author: BmanBlazer
State.Description: This mod adds 20 backpacks into the game. One hand-picked world location for each backpack. Backpacks spawn on NPCs, including vendors, and in containers. Featuring over 60 workbench mods and over 50 selectable colors with an additional five new magazines with unique perks for each one. Don't forget about the new discoverable location to explore!
State.Name: Backpacks of the Commonwealth

State.Author: InstantHero - aka Vegawagon350
State.Description: This is InstantHero's Better Drumlin Diner re-hosted on Nexus.  Precombines are not touched so it won't cause issues with FPS, compatibility, or stability.  This has been my favorite Drumlin Diner for a long time.
State.Name: Better Drumlin Diner

State.Author: ScreamingLake and Mortercotic
State.Description: Beyond the Commonwealth is a community-wide initiative to bring music created by members of the Fallout 4 community into quest and new location mods that currently do not have any.
State.Name: Beyond the Commonwealth - A Music Expansion Project

Original.Name: BtC - The Mannequin Cult Music Addition-71365-1-0-1685390661.zip

State.Author: ScreamingLake and Mortercotic
State.Description: Beyond the Commonwealth is a community-wide initiative to bring music created by members of the Fallout 4 community into quest and new location mods that currently do not have any.
State.Name: Beyond the Commonwealth - A Music Expansion Project

State.Author: Bwones and ColdFrontST
State.Description: Adds a Crossbow with custom animations and level list integration.
State.Name: Crossbow

State.Author: Subleader - Garkain - Oh Deer - HeroicPie
State.Description: This mod adds the HK USP Pistol to Fallout 4 with a lot of customization, leveled list and a unique variant. Compatible with Tactical Reload.
State.Name: HK USP - Pistol

State.Author: registrator2000
State.Description: HUDFramework is a UI framework that makes it possible for mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.
State.Name: HUDFramework

State.Author: Dank Rafft
State.Description: Removes most static/placed junk items, consumables, armor, weapons and ammo from the game world and improves performance as a result. Also covers Leveled Item lists to some extent.
State.Name: Looted World

State.Author: Bombchu
State.Description: You know her, you love her, and now you can make sweet, brain spattering love to her.
State.Name: Lucille

State.Author: Degenerate Dak
State.Description: A brand new pack of melee weapons, all being made of scrap and improvised parts, perfect for any wasteland raider! Complete with leveled list injections.
State.Name: Makeshift Melee Weapon Pack

Original.Name: It has been a long time - 2k-69531-0-1-1678471014.7z

State.Author: HappoMatka
State.Description: Retexture of a box.
State.Name: MetalBox retexture - It has been a long time

State.Author: Dexials
State.Description: Remake and better version of my original no rad mod, this time "It just works"
State.Name: No Radiation (Redone)

State.Author: VTheHeretic
State.Description: Anticipated retexture of the commonwealth.
State.Name: Project Dementia

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: Dynamically find and replace virtually any actor(s) with virtually any actor(s) in game to deliver new exciting surprises. Then manage their respawning for yet more surprises over time.
State.Name: Replace Any Actor with Any Actor

State.Author: Marvesly
State.Description: Immersive Animation Framework patch for the incredible rework of South of the Sea by haplessAccreditation.
State.Name: SOTS Atom's Storm - Immersive Animation Framework Patch

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: A spooky horror quest mod. Go inside the Kelly Manor, enter a world of terror and hope you can escape alive.
State.Name: The Kelly Manor Horror - Quest

State.Author: RedRocketTV
State.Description: The Outcasts’ Hideout is an old-school bunker player home loaded with interactive features and custom assets. Many of the custom assets are recreations of those from FO3 and FNV. The bunker is based on Reimann’s Bunker from the Fallout: New Vegas mod, A World of Pain. The Hideout is located just east of Sunshine Tidings Co-Op.
State.Name: The Outcasts' Hideout Player Home

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: An abandoned town, lakes, forests and a curse that needs to be broken. Also tons of new settlement options
State.Name: The Wilderness - Now with four anomalies

State.Author: mandragorasprouts
State.Description:
I find fallout 4 overly vibrant and colorful for post apocalyptic world,  climate must be harsh and unforgiving , so I tweaked weathers a bit.

Nothing too fancy, it's just subtle visual overhaul to give fo4 same desolate look  that older fallout games had.
State.Name: Polluted Climate

State.Author: CoolerThanCoolest and Bwones
State.Description: Makes misc junk items usable as melee weapons. Now you can happily bash ghoul's heads in with a shovel, or stab mutants in the eyes with a screw driver.
State.Name: Misc To Melee

State.Author: hidcon
State.Description: Disables VATS and overhauls perks that give bonus in VATS.
State.Name: No VATS Overhaul

State.Author: reg2k and Neanka
State.Description: The Extended Dialogue Interface removes the hardcoded 4-option limit on dialogue and adds full engine support for any number of player dialogue options.
State.Name: Extended Dialogue Interface

State.Author: Gopher
State.Description: HUD when you need. Hide when you don't.
State.Name: Immersive HUD - iHUD

State.Author: Zen
State.Description: Retexture of the church doors and windows, in particular e.g. for Salem Museum and Trinity Church. 4k and 2k available.
State.Name: Very Zen Church Doors'n Windows

State.Author: Fallout 4 Experiences Team
State.Description: This experience will provide a complete horror-themed overhaul of Fallout 4.  It uses Whispering Hills and Fallout 4-76 Open World at its core with several accompanying mods to completely transform the game into a terrifying and unique survival-horror open exploration experience.
State.Name: Whispering Chills - The Ultimate Horror Overhaul Wabbajack Modlist

State.Author: HappoMatka
State.Description: Retexture for the mannequins in the game.
State.Name: A Mannequin Re-texture

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: A high-quality Beretta M9/92FS pistol featuring loads of colors, high-tech modifications, and unique legendaries. All new meshes, textures, and sounds. Designed to be viable for a full play-through.
State.Name: Beretta M9-FS Pistol (92FS)

State.Author: Elzee
State.Description: Urban car alarms.  Can be useful.
State.Name: Car Alarm

State.Author: LiquidBronze
State.Description: Commonwealth Wilderness Overhaul is a medium-large sized mod that adds dozens upon dozens of hand placed scenes, objects and creatures across the entire commonwealth wilderness.
State.Name: Commonwealth Wilderness Overhaul

State.Author: gargorias
State.Description: This is a comprehensive lighting mod that brings you many more shadow lights and a general improvement to overall lighting, ambience and fog to the interiors of the Commonweatlh, Far Harbor and Nuka World.
State.Name: Ultra Interior Lighting

State.Author: SpringHeelJon
State.Description: Balances the environmental effects on all base game and DLC transparent material files.
State.Name: Gloomy Glass - All transparent materials revised

State.Author: neeher
State.Description: Endure a brief spooky quest to obtain the Kelly Macabre, a rifle made by a demented little girl named Madison. Happy Halloween!
State.Name: Kelly Macabre

State.Author: Fallout 4 Experiences Team
State.Description: This experience will provide a complete horror-themed overhaul of Fallout 4.  It uses Whispering Hills and Fallout 4-76 Open World at its core with several accompanying mods to completely transform the game into a terrifying and unique survival-horror open exploration experience.
State.Name: Whispering Chills - The Ultimate Horror Overhaul Wabbajack Modlist

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: A small to medium sized settlement contained in its own worldspace
State.Name: Witch House

State.Author: Hedied
State.Description: Adds actual gun shot reverbs which makes a big difference when shooting in interior.
State.Name: _Sound Zero_

Original.Name: Alex's Male First Person Camera Height Fix-27582-2-0.zip

State.Author: Alex me lol
State.Description: Adjust the eyeheight in first person if you play as a male character.
State.Name: Alex's Male First Person Camera Height Fix

State.Author: Oynlen and DeathByKitty
State.Description: Transforms the Commonwealth into a dense and overgrown forest landscape without disabling precombines.
State.Name: A Forest

State.Author: AKcelsior and crazyjackal
State.Description: Sick of molerats and bloatflys triggering epic combat music? So are we.
State.Name: Dynamic Music Overhaul

State.Author: Valdacil
State.Description: This mod allows you to have Dogmeat and a standard companion at the same time using in game functionality (not hacks or console commands).
State.Name: Everyone's Best Friend (Dogmeat and Companion At Same Time - No Console - No Hack)

State.Author: CAPCOM - Arroganz
State.Description: Final released one of my biggest projects to date. Includes zombies from RE 2 Remake, Umbrella Chronicles, Racoon City, and the original RE 1 Remake. This is no April Fools joke...
State.Name: FallEvil - Zombie Mega Pack

State.Author: Glass
State.Description: Fixes most of the exterior flickering aka z fighting in the game, particularly in the Boston and Cambridge areas.  (Modder's Resource.)
State.Name: Flicker Fixer

State.Author: Subleader
State.Description: This mod adds the Uzi smg to Fallout 4 with a lot of customization and leveled list.
State.Name: IMI Uzi - Smg

State.Author: MunkySpunk - Pra - Whisper
State.Description: Replaces all awful vanilla candles with more advanced synchronized animated versions. No broken precombines, no overwritten precombines. All items are scrappable if encountered in workshop.
State.Name: Immersive Candles

State.Author: payl0ad - BabyBearington
State.Description: Adds more unmarked interior locations to the game.
State.Name: Inside Jobs - Commonwealth Interiors Add-On

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Features a brand new eat and drink system, which relies on weight of the item instead of the caps value and allows you to control it.

In addition to that, you can tweak many aspects of the survival added features. Like tweaking disease chance, disabling Adrenaline. Choose how long you can maximally sleep on the different bet types.

And mo
State.Name: Survival Configuration Menu

State.Author: Rantanplan
State.Description: Tweaked version of the "Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul" Mod by mm137
State.Name: Reverb and Ambiance Overhaul - Tweaked

Original.Name: SKK Replace Any Actor Custom Replacement List-61553-3-5-5-1655959074.zip

State.Author: Fallout 4 Experiences Team
State.Description: This experience will provide a complete horror-themed overhaul of Fallout 4.  It uses Whispering Hills and Fallout 4-76 Open World at its core with several accompanying mods to completely transform the game into a terrifying and unique survival-horror open exploration experience.
State.Name: Whispering Chills - The Ultimate Horror Overhaul Wabbajack Modlist

State.Author: Ceaseless and PDE
State.Description: Gives some flair to the diners around the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Starlight Drive-In And Diner - Lighting

State.Author: Chiaro22
State.Description: This mod adds 11 new, atmospheric interiors to the Commonwealth; from failed businesses to rundown bars, long abandoned homes, and even a dark crypt or two.
State.Name: Stumble Upon Interiors

State.Author: Zen
State.Description: A retexture of the creatures from the great FGEP mod in 4k and 2k
State.Name: Very Zen FGEP Textures

State.Author: TheBigLidowski
State.Description: Adds a small amount of perks (currently 32) and one new skill (Survival) to use with Be Exceptional perks overhaul.
State.Name: Humble Perks Pack

State.Author: Ryan
State.Description: It's like buffout but for the engine
State.Name: Buffout 4

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

Now there is a separate version for VR.
State.Name: High FPS Physics Fix

State.Author: Antonix35
State.Description:
Fixed crashes caused by Weapon Debris setting



Исправление вылетов при включенной настройке "Осколки от выстрелов"
State.Name: Weapon Debris Crash Fix

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A much better high contrast world map with roads, topography, and waterline all clearly visible.  Optional number grid and regions.
State.Name: Improved Map with Visible Roads

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description:
Features a brand new eat and drink system, which relies on weight of the item instead of the caps value and allows you to control it.

In addition to that, you can tweak many aspects of the survival added features. Like tweaking disease chance, disabling Adrenaline. Choose how long you can maximally sleep on the different bet types.

And mo
State.Name: Survival Configuration Menu

State.Author: BetaVirus
State.Description: DISCONTINUED - This mod improves performance (FPS) in Boston and surrounding area. External areas only. This mod is beneficial to anyone that roams the Boston area with mods that disable previs or break precombines in the Boston area.
State.Name: Boston FPS Fix - aka BostonDT PreVis-PreCombine

State.Author: Ceft
State.Description: Various Meshes, Textures, Matswaps, Etc.
State.Name: Ceft's Main File

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: FO4 Particle Patch is a comprehensive mod that updates hundreds of mesh and material files to make fog, smoke, water, blood, dirt puffs, dust (and much more) glow in the dark less, and better utilize ambient & point lighting. Also improves distance rendering for Far Harbor fog effects.
State.Name: Fallout 4 Particle Patch - No More Glowing Objects

Original.Name: Inner City Ambiance ESL flagged ESP-38666-1-4-1671130132.zip

State.Author: El Ha
State.Description: Wind, rumble and a bit of paranoia
State.Name: Inner City Ambience - An Urban Soundscape

State.Author: ossumpossum
State.Description: Decent workaround to this horrendous issue
State.Name: Flickering Blood and Flickering Puddles - The Solution

State.Author: Giammotto
State.Description: Modifies and increases the volume of all melee impact sounds, weapon handling foley, swings, punches, power armour impacts, both given and received, the result is a more satisfying melee experience with hits that feel much more physical and brutal, getting gashed by a machete will be a noticeable hit
State.Name: Melee Impact Overhaul

State.Author: FX0x01 - Hitman47101
State.Description:
This Mod adds the OTS-33

As usual the weapon features Custom animations, and sounds, and a variety of optional modifications.
State.Name: OTs-33 Pernach - Pistol

State.Author: HULKHOD3N x PR BF2 DevTeam
State.Description: Changes almost all footstep sounds into more realistic ones. Including subtle gear and backpack rattle. *Snow Edition* available.
State.Name: Project Reality Footsteps FO4

State.Author: Varangian Studio
State.Description: A night time NPC spawner system with creatures that stalk and attack the player. Has a Vampire and Werewolf system and a small quest.
State.Name: The Haunting

State.Author: HeirFlick
State.Description: Replaces Overdue Book with Evil Dead Necronomicon
State.Name: Evil Dead Necronomicon

State.Author: Bwones
State.Description: A very simple way to do manual reloading. No more automatic reloading when you run out of ammo.
State.Name: Manual Reload Simple

State.Author: Mr Dave
State.Description: Enhanced normal maps for the eyes.
State.Name: Eye Normal Map Fix Fallout 4 Edition

State.Author: Monkatraz
State.Description: Fixes animation clipping on a lot of modded weapons, specifically the ones that go sideways.
State.Name: Grab the Damn Mag

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: Fatigue - ECR removes the the static aim behavior when using guns. Your character stats influence your gun handling and will improve it, the more you invest in it. The weight of your gun, now slowly drains your Action Points, while aiming and handling the recoil. The lower your Action Points fall, the wobble of your weapon will increase.
State.Name: Fatigue - Enhanced Combat Realism

Original.Name: Crate 2k Retexture - It has been a long time-69658-0-1-1678743224.7z

State.Author: HappoMatka
State.Description: Another box bites the damp/time.
State.Name: Another Crate Retexture - It has been a long time

State.Author: epsadin
State.Description: This is an extended version of the amazing Barefoot Footstep mod. It adds barefoot sounds to metal, carpet and vault floor materials, as well as modifies stone / concrete and sand ones. This mod also adds barefoot sneaking sounds to all of the above. Credit goes to the user GrozaTerroristow, who is the author of the famous original mod.

State.Author: Subleader - Garkain - Oh Deer - HeroicPie
State.Description: This mod adds the HK USP Pistol to Fallout 4 with a lot of customization, leveled list and a unique variant. Compatible with Tactical Reload.
State.Name: HK USP - Pistol

State.Author: Fallout 4 Experiences Team
State.Description: This experience will provide a complete horror-themed overhaul of Fallout 4.  It uses Whispering Hills and Fallout 4-76 Open World at its core with several accompanying mods to completely transform the game into a terrifying and unique survival-horror open exploration experience.
State.Name: Whispering Chills - The Ultimate Horror Overhaul Wabbajack Modlist

State.Author: Ceft
State.Description: Exploration awaits! Uncover dozens of new locations created from the closed buildings around the Commonwealth.
State.Name: Open Commonwealth

State.Author: Giammotto
State.Description: Increases the volume of all physical objects (including grenades) when they bounce, hit walls and materials, if you bump on them or push/manipulate them including bullet casings on all surfaces, for the audiophiles of Fallout 4
State.Name: Physics Impact Overhaul and Bullet Casing Sounds

State.Author: SKK50
State.Description: MORE RANDOM ENCOUNTERS ! Less Random Encounters ! no random encounters ! Take control of the base game random encounter system to amp up or dial down the combat opportunities.
State.Name: Random Encounter Manager by SKK

Original.Name: Subway runner dynamic lighting (shadows) V6.1 fixed nav mesh-18639-V7.rar

State.Author: Ghostfc3s
State.Description: This mod connects 90% of the standard subway stations, and creates a network of subway tunnels filled with raiders, super mutants, synths and ghouls. Subway stations have been added throughout this network.
State.Name: Subway Runner

State.Author: Ablaze666
State.Description: If you're using a mod that makes the nights dark, you've probably seen them: White ripples on black water during dark rainy nights. This mod fixes this by making those ripples dark as well.
State.Name: Less Annoying Water Rain Ripples

State.Author: Kazeite
State.Description: Weathered First Aid Kit
State.Name: Weathered First Aid Kit

State.Author: mm137
State.Description: A much better high contrast world map with roads, topography, and waterline all clearly visible.  Optional number grid and regions.
State.Name: Improved Map with Visible Roads

State.Author: fadingsignal
State.Description: A high-quality Beretta M9/92FS pistol featuring loads of colors, high-tech modifications, and unique legendaries. All new meshes, textures, and sounds. Designed to be viable for a full play-through.
State.Name: Beretta M9-FS Pistol (92FS)

State.Author: Zzyxzz
State.Description: GCM allows you easily set many game settings without the need of additional ESPs or console commands.

State.Description: Provides version independent IDs used for dynamically relocating offsets at runtime.
State.Name: Address Library for F4SE Plugins

Original.Name: Looks Menu Customization Compendium Fix INI-56465-0-0-04-1639358359.rar

State.Author: Hailfire89
State.Description: After loving this Mod for so long only to see it collect dust since 2017 and seeing how it is broken it took a bit to try to look up how to fix and since I couldn't find a fix I started looking at the files themselves to see why it broke so far I found it was turning off values that ended up breaking it.
